about_the_game:
'Ars Regia' - Original SoundTrack written, performed and produced by J.A.M.

_____
DISC 1:
Ars Regia - Main tracks

_____
DISC 2:
Egregor Works II - Dirty Noises, Ambients and drones

_____
DISC 3:
Hell Works - Synh orquestal, Ambients, Bosses music

_____
DISC 4:
Cassettes - Noises, Spectrogram codes, Ambients and drones, Scratch

_____
DISC 5:
Tracks from album: J.A.M. - PLAZIDO (Mundillo's session mixed for Ars Regia)

_____
DISC 6:
Pigments and boards - Ambients and drones

_____
DISC 7:
Pink Black - Electronic music, Dance, House, Trance, Techno, Break, Downtempo, Experimental

_____
DISC: 8
The Villa - Electronic music, Metal, Chiptune, Acid 80's synthwave, Downtempo, Electro, Breakbeat, Acid breaks, Minimal techno, Experimental
